title: Convert an rgb  mask image to coco json format
body:
I annotated images using PixelAnnotationTool provided here: https://github.com/abreheret/PixelAnnotationTool and using the provided dictionary:
`{
    "labels": {
        "unlabeled": {
            "categorie": "void",
            "color": [
                0,
                0,
                0
            ],
            "id": 0,
            "id_categorie": 0,
            "name": "unlabeled"
        },
        "bicycle_motorcycle": {
            "categorie": "bicycle_motorcycle",
            "color": [
                119,
                11,
                32
            ],
            "id": 1,
            "id_categorie": 1,
            "name": "bicycle_motorcycle"
        },
        "bus": {
            "categorie": "bus",
            "color": [
                102,
                51,
                0
            ],
            "id": 2,
            "id_categorie": 2,
            "name": "bus"
        },
        "truck": {
            "categorie": "truck",
            "color": [
                0,
                0,
                70
            ],
            "id": 3,
            "id_categorie": 3,
            "name": "truck"
        },
        "pedestrian": {
            "categorie": "pedestrian",
            "color": [
                0,
                2,
                180
            ],
            "id": 4,
            "id_categorie": 4,
            "name": "pedestrian"
        },
        "car": {
            "categorie": "car",
            "color": [
                0,
                180,
                0
            ],
            "id": 5,
            "id_categorie": 5,
            "name": "car"
        },
        "out_of_roi": {
            "categorie": "out_of_roi",
            "color": [
                0,
                0,
                0
            ],
            "id": 6,
            "id_categorie": 6,
            "name": "out_of_roi"
        }
    }
}
`


I want to convert these RGB masks into json polygon format so that I can use them in Mask R-CNN: I posted this question in stackoverflow here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/54802089/convert-an-rgb-mask-image-to-coco-json-polygon-format
